name: Ava Thompson
title: Frontend Developer
tagLine: Crafting accessible, performant, and beautiful web experiences.
about: I'm a frontend developer with a passion for clean code, animation, and accessibility. I work mostly with React and have a background in UI/UX design.

description.short: A personal site to showcase my work and blogs.
description.detailed: Built with React and Bootstrap, this responsive portfolio features smooth animations, lazy loading, and dynamic routing. It serves as both a professional landing page and a writing platform.

description.short: Real-time weather info with OpenWeatherMap API.
description.detailed: A responsive dashboard that fetches and displays weather data for multiple cities. It features chart visualizations, dark mode, and offline caching using service workers.
